title: Deep Learning Practice Competency Enhancement: Human-Machine Collaboration Learning Design Workshop Based on Metaverse

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Designing three or more math problem-solving scenarios using metaverse platforms
Proposing two or more implementation plans for learner-AI avatar collaboration systems

Learners will develop one rubric evaluating creative math activities (problem-solving, modeling, visualization) in virtual environments (e.g., Minecraft Education Edition, GeoGebra 3D) based on five criteria (e.g., creativity, logical consistency, technical implementation) within six months and secure validity scores of 4.0 or higher (5-point scale) from a three-member expert review panel.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
